
Changelog
---------

1.1.0 (2011/10/25)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Bug fixes: support for case insensitive project names and support for
  counting all release files (e.g. binaries in addition to sdist) and
  correct number of release files (bug fix).
  [JNRowe]

- Package cleanup
  [aclark]

1.0 (04/13/2011)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Initial release
